title: Find your nearest VOSA test station for commercial vehicles

details.description: Find VOSA test stations for commercial vehicles in England, Scotland and Wales - address, contact details, types of test
details.more_information:
Most commercial vehicles need an [annual test](/annual-test-for-lorries-buses-and-trailers "annual tests") to make sure they are roadworthy and meet standards set by the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA).

You can find information on:

* test station addresses and contact details
* test station opening times
* any Authorised Testing Facilities (ATF) and Designated Premises (DP) located near to the test station
* which tests they offer, eg heavy goods vehicle (HGV) and public service vehicle (PSV) tests
* other services offered by the test station, eg [Individual Vehicle Approvals (IVA)](/vehicle-approval/individual-vehicle-approval "Individual Vehicle Approvals (IVA)") and [vehicle identity checks (VIC)](/vehicle-identity-check "vehicle identity checks (VIC)")

*[ATF]: authorised testing facilities
*[DP]: designated premises
*[PSV]: public service vehicle
*[HGV]: heavy goods vehicle
*[HGV]: heavy goods vehicle
*[VIC]: Vehicle Identity Checks
*[IVA]: Individual Vehicle Approvals
